name: Got Green? St. Patrick's Day onesie
description:
Here’s a great onesie for your little leprechaun!
St.Patrick would be proud!

	This onesie is available in sizes newborn to 24 mos.
Each onesie is custom-made and each letter is carefully appliqued. 
Please allow 3-6 days to create.
All fabrics and onesie are pre-washed to allow for any shrinkage.

	Please choose either a long-sleeve onesie or short-sleeve.

name: Retro floral bib
description:
Retro floral pink and green print. So girly…
Flannel fabric on the front and soft, absorbent terry cloth on the back. Adjustable velcro closure keeps this boutique bib in place. 
Approx. size is a generous 13”x9”, large enough for babies and toddlers.

	Matching burp cloth and onesie avail. separately. All three items make for a great baby gift and will come wrapped in a tulle bow with a Piggy Baby tag.
I have a ton of other cool fabrics, so email or convo me if you want to see them.
Your bib will be custom-made, so placement of fabric on bib may differ slightly.
